text: Stephen Pritko (December 21, 1920 – June 6, 2015) was an American football end who played eight seasons in the National Football League (NFL).Steve Pritko's obituary He was born in Northampton, Pennsylvania. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1920 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American football ends Category:Boston Yanks players Category:Cleveland Rams players Category:Green Bay Packers players Category:Los Angeles Rams players Category:New York Bulldogs players Category:New York Giants players Category:Villanova Wildcats football players Category:People from Northampton, Pennsylvania Category:Players of American football from Pennsylvania
title: Steve Pritko
